item.description:
Are you an adrenaline junkie or want to conquer a fear of heights? Come join us for a day of zip lining in NH. A few of us are staying overnight to hike the next day. Your stay is optional but always welcome. If a day of hiking isn't your thing, Lincoln offers lots of other activities and beautiful scenery.

Only 4 of the available 13 spots are available. Use the website to make your reservation for the July 11, 2:30 Zipline Tour. Spots are filling up so hopefully we can get our group all into the same tour. Kids are welcome but please check the weight requirements on the website.

Check out the new videos. This will be fun!

Zip-line Videos
item.name: Alpine Adventures Zip-Line Canopy Tour
